mapper.html:
Dear {{2.`1`}},

We hope this email finds you well. We are reaching out to kindly request your assistance in completing the request information form.

The form is crucial for gathering the necessary data and details to proceed with the supplier selection process for our strawberries. Your prompt completion of the form will greatly contribute to its success.

Please find the link to the form below and fill it out accurately, ensuring all mandatory fields are completed.

Note: use your individual business key (in subject: {{8.bKey}}) to complete the form. Kindly return the completed form within 7 days from the receipt of this email.

Request Information Form

If you have any questions or encounter any issues, please don't hesitate to contact redsweetberries@gmail.com. Your cooperation is highly appreciated.

Thank you for your time and attention to this matter.

Best regards,
RedSweetBerries aka StrawBerries
mapper.subject: Request for Information {{2.`1`}} {{8.bKey}}
